LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.label: запакований сухий пайок
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.description: Запакована їжа високої якості, вироблена для використання в умовах виживання. Не гниє, але може псуватися, якщо залишити зовні. Чудово підходить для подорожей.
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.label: поживна паста
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.description: A synthetic mixture of protein, carbohydrates, and vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs, and absolutely disgusting.
LanguageData.MealSimple.label: simple meal
LanguageData.MealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from one main ingredient.
LanguageData.MealFine.label: fine meal
LanguageData.MealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a variety of ingredients.
LanguageData.MealLavish.label: lavish meal
LanguageData.MealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.Kibble.label: kibble
LanguageData.Kibble.description: Animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources. Humans can eat it, but they really, really don't like it.
LanguageData.Pemmican.label: pemmican
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
